summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena requires personal appearance at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, on a specified date at 9:00 a.m., and warns of contempt of court for failure to comply.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which the subpoena is issued to compel testimony.

events.title: Issuance of Subpoena in Maxwell Case
events.description: A subpoena is issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 19, 2021, by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
The subpoena commands an individual to appear personally at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, at 9:00 a.m. to testify and give evidence.
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the individual to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena is issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
